thread.title: NYPD fatally shoot man with a pipe after reports of a gun

title: NYPD fatally shoot man with a pipe after reports of a gun
text:
NYPD fatally shoot man with a pipe after reports of a gun 12:23pm IST - 01:38 
A police official says New York police officers on Wednesday shot to death a black man who pointed a metal pipe at them, after responding to emergency callers who said the main was aiming a firearm at pedestrians. Ryan Brooks reports.   
A police official says New York police officers on Wednesday shot to death a black man who pointed a metal pipe at them, after responding to emergency callers who said the main was aiming a firearm at pedestrians. Ryan Brooks reports.  //reut.rs/2q6M8Hg
